title: Identity Check App
text: I found the identity check App to be very effective and easy to use. From start to finish the app guides you through every step in the process making it simple and effective. The entire process took less than 5 minutes using my I-phone 11.

title: Inadequate, unhelpful, and frustrating
text: I am an ex pat, trying to sign onto the government gateway. The multi factor identification requires two of three forms of ID; a current UK, drivers license, a current, UK, passport, or current credit information. As stated, I’ve lived in the US for sometime, and as a result, have no UK drivers license and no UK credit to be found. As a result, I can’t be verified this way. A second option was biometric facial, scanning from my passport. After three attempts this failed as well. On top of all that I’m trying to get help through the online chat service with HM revenue and customs. There was a problem with a Service. I have no way to sign into the gateway. And no help in resolving the problem.

title: Easy and worked straight away
text: Don’t know what everyone’s complaining about. This was really easy. Took my photo even at night under a normal house light. The biometric passport connected, all done.

title: Worked for British passport id
text: Worked fine to confirm me. Had to try a couple of times and get the lighting right but it did work.

title: ID Check
text: Excellent app. Simple and fast to use. Thank you

title: choice of facial recognition software is poor
text: There are so many better biometric id software solutions available.  the one selected by this app is an older legacy tech which have been superseded by far better solutions that would make this app so much more user friendly.

title: Passport Scan does not work
text: I’ve spent the last half hour trying to get my passport scan through only to keep receiving the same error message. And as a result, I can’t seem to verify my identity and and in turn gain access to important administrative documents that I very badly need.

title: The best gov app I’ve ever seen
text: Omg this app is just amazing. Whomever invented it really deserves a Nobel prize. Makes life so simpleeee and easy!

title: Scanning the biometric chip
text: I tried scanning the biometric chip, I followed all the instructions numerous times in the 20 minutes before being told there was an error and to start again on the computer. Please sort out glitches

title: Hi speed ID Check
text: So far so good, using tech for hi speed secure ID check was a cinch.

title: Incredible technology!
text: Bravo!

title: Passport scan doesn’t work
text: The app cannot scan passports correctly. It can scan residency permits if you get it just right, but requires many tries.

title: Incredible- good job hmrc!
text: Amazed by technology

title: Way over the top!
text: One would think I was attempting to access top secret national security files rather than the national insurance system!

title: Only use if you have to
text: Garbage. What’s the point of this. It takes ages to work then cannot confirm who you are.

title: YouTube
text: Incorrect information on how to scan, YouTube wins

title: Does not work
text: Just keeps crashing!

title: Impossible to scan chip
text: Impossible to scan chip big waste of time.

title: Doesn't work
text: App is supposed to scan a passport, but it doesn't do that (with iPhone 14)

title: Didn’t work
text: Doesn’t work for US passport

title: Total sh t
text: Doesn’t work

title: Rubbish
text: Cannot find the chip on a USA passport. So frustrating as my UK passport has expired :(

title: Passport feature does not work
text: When I try to log into Government Gateway for self assessment thru this app with my US Passport (I am on a work visa in the UK), I receive the error message: “No MRZ code.” No idea what this means, but the app does seem to find my passport as it becomes highlighted with a green border.
